Devex Design System

A comprehensive design system that unified Devex's digital presence and improved development efficiency.

Overview

Led the development of Devex's first comprehensive design system, creating a unified visual language and component library that improved consistency and development efficiency across all digital products.

The Challenge

Devex's digital products were experiencing inconsistencies in design and development, leading to:

  • Inconsistent user experiences across different sections of the platform
  • Redundant development work for similar components
  • Difficulty in maintaining brand consistency
  • Slower development cycles due to lack of reusable components

The Solution

Developed a comprehensive design system that included:

  • Core design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and breakpoints
  • Component library with detailed documentation
  • Usage guidelines and best practices
  • Implementation examples and code snippets

Impact

  • Reduced development time by 40% for new features
  • Improved design consistency across all products
  • Streamlined onboarding for new team members
  • Enhanced brand recognition and user trust
